text: André Dussollier (born 17 February 1946) is a French actor. He is known for his role as Jacques in the comedy Three Men and a Cradle and Philippe Rénier in Black Box. ==Awards== Year Group Award Film Result 1993 César Awards Best Supporting Actor A Heart in Winter (Un cœur en hiver) 1998 César Awards Best Actor Same Old Song (On connaît la chanson) 2002 César Awards Best Supporting Actor The Officers' Ward (La Chambre des officiers) ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors
title: André Dussollier
